actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To prohibit aircraft from flying over the Ballpark in Arlington, Texas, during certain times, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits aircraft from flying at less than a specified altitude over, and within a certain distance of, the Ballpark in Arlington, Texas, during public events. Imposes a civil penalty for violations of this Act.

titles.title: To prohibit aircraft from flying over the Ballpark in Arlington, Texas, during certain times, and for other purposes.
